title: [preset_manager/tutorial.md] misunderstanding reference in the double pendulum example section

content.html:
In the double pendulum example have been chosen 3 different reference frames:

  • text: it is said that "the pendulum to swing back and forth in the XZ plane" (i.e. revolute_joint = [0 1 0]);
  • image: it is shown that the pendulum oscillate in the XY plane (i.e. revolute_joint = [0 0 1]);
  • code: the revolute joints have <xyz>1 0 0</xyz> property (i.e. revolute_joint = [1 0 0]).

Anyway, I think that the purpose of the example is achieved the same, but there is a bit of ambiguity.
